title: Gintama
summary: Follow the hilarious adventures of Gintoki and his friends as they tackle odd jobs and encounter eccentric characters in an alternate Edo period.

title: KonoSuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
summary: A dead gamer gets transported to a fantasy world, where he teams up with an eccentric goddess, a masochistic knight, and a crazy mage.

title: Nichijou: My Ordinary Life
summary: A comedic look at the surreal and exaggerated moments in the everyday lives of three high school girls and a robot caretaker.

title: One Punch Man
summary: Saitama, a hero who defeats enemies with a single punch, struggles with boredom and finding worthy opponents.

title: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.
summary: Saiki, a psychic high schooler, tries to live a normal life despite his overwhelming powers and bizarre friends.

title: Asobi Asobase
summary: Three schoolgirls form a play club, leading to absurd and hilarious antics as they navigate friendship and competitiveness.

title: Ouran High School Host Club
summary: A scholarship student at an elite academy accidentally joins a host club and gets caught up in its ridiculous antics.

title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto
summary: Sakamoto, the coolest high school student, effortlessly solves every problem with style and grace, to everyone's amazement.

title: Daily Lives of High School Boys
summary: Follow the hilarious daily lives of three high school boys as they experience absurd and awkward teenage moments.

title: Luckyâ˜†Star
summary: A lighthearted and humorous look at the daily lives of a group of quirky high school girls and their conversations about life, anime, and food.
